<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shared Avoidance](/Feats.aspx?ID=1703) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 122 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Premonition of Avoidance](/Feats.aspx?ID=1696)

</column>

---

You can project your premonitions of danger to your allies. When you use [Premonition of Avoidance](/Feats.aspx?ID=1696), allies within 15 feet of you who are rolling the same saving throw against the same hazard also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to their saving throws.
name: Shared Avoidance
